categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: This small space cruiser was used by the Rebel Alliance for general transportation.

Princess Leia Organa used this cruiser to leave Yavin 4 in search of Luke Skywalker, who had gone missing while searching for a new location for the Rebel base and was eventually captured by Crimson Jack before she could find him.
The vessel required a single pilot to be operated.
In Issue 10, this ship has certain design elements hinting at a Corellian Engineering Corporation origin.
The ship's appearance in issue 11 differs radically from that in issue 10. Also, in issue 11 an "S" or "5" appears on the hull.
